themes: transparency in city funding and income generation
equitable grant allocation across art forms
key_phrases: programs that align with an artist’s growth
provide transparency on how city funds can contribute to generating additional income for self-sufficiency
grants or funds allocated towards artists from various art forms, including music and performance art
rather than requiring artists to compete with each other for limited opportunities
all of us deserve equal chances to participate
barriers_identified: artists competing with each other for limited opportunities
lack of transparency on how city funds contribute to income
insufficient support for diverse art forms
solutions_proposed: programs that align with artist growth
greater transparency on city funding and income generation
grants or funds allocated to various art forms without competition among artists
